hotels.name: Chennai Royal Hotels
hotels.description: Located in the heart of the Chennai city, Chennai Royal Hotels offers top-notch facilities such as an in-house lounge with a bar and pool, a 24-hour cafe and luxe rooms

hotels.name: Madurai Meenakshi Hotel
hotels.description: Located in the heart of the temple city, Madurai Meenakshi Hotel is of the best hotels in the city for a quality and luxurious stay. Equipped with gyms, spas, unlimited buffets, yoga bars and night clubs, you are in for a treat from the word go.
hotels.bedType: 2 single beds or 1 queen size bed
